channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Embedded OpenType (EOT) font engine
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Windows Embedded OpenType (EOT) font engine

item.title: CVE-2018-0855|2024-08-05T03:44:10.447Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- windows%20embedded%20opentype%20%28eot%29%20font%20engine
item.description: The Microsoft Windows Embedded OpenType (EOT) font engine in Microsoft Windows 7 SP1 and Windows Server 2008 R2 allows information disclosure, due to how the Windows EOT font engine handles embedded fonts, aka "Windows EOT Font Engine Information Disclosure Vulnerability". This CVE ID is unique from CVE-2018-0755, CVE-2018-0760, and CVE-2018-0761.
